snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic beat 10th-seeded Gael Monfils 6-3, 6-2 on Saturday night to reach the Rogers Cup final and improve to 12-0 against the Frenchman....
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic beat 10th-seeded Gael Monfils 6-3, 6-2 on Saturday night to reach the Rogers Cup final and improve to 12-0 against the Frenchman.

headline.print_headline: Top-Ranked Djokovic Beats Monfils to Reach Toronto Final
headline.main: Top-Ranked Djokovic Beats Monfils to Reach Toronto Final
